original_text: If people in any town hurt you because of me, you should leave that town immediately. Go to another town. I tell you this: You will not have enough time to speak your message in all the towns of Israel. I, the Son of Man, will return before that can happen.
korean_text: 이 동네에서 너희를 박해하거든 저 동네로 피하라 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 이스라엘의 모든 동네를 다 다니지 못하여서 인자가 오리라

sentences.original_text: If people in any town hurt you
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 동네 사람들이 너를 해를 입히면

sentences.original_text: you should leave that town immediately
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 동네를 즉시 떠나야 한다

sentences.original_text: You will not have enough time
in all the towns of Israel
will return before that can happen
sentences.korean_translation: 그 일이 일어나기 전에 돌아올 것이다
